data.title: I Am FTW ü´∂
data.content: This app has truly saved my mental health in so many ways, on so many days. It seems to pop up in just the right moment when I really need that reminder to keep going, and the messages seem to resonate perfectly. ‚ú®A genius app for those who need mental health affirmations. üíõ As someone who has struggled with MH since childhood, I am so grateful for this little app. I tell everybody about it! A giant thanks + kudos to the developers!ü´∂‚ú® Side note: as a Mama of a 5yo + 3yo, and also a 2nd grade teacher‚Ä¶I‚Äôd love to see one specifically for kids. Building healthy self talk young and confidence is soo important! üíï
